BG.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
BG.description: Bonus until 31/12/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pokémon Gold Version for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/01/2018. Bonus until 21/09/2018 Download code for the Mythical Pokémon Celebi. The download code is valid until 31/10/2018. Welcome to the exciting adventures of Pokémon Gold and Silver! These two games sport a colourful look and supply a slew of new Pokémon in addition to the 150 from Pokémon Red, Blue and Yellow. Starting out as a rookie Trainer, you'll explore the sprawling island of Johto, and embark on a quest to capture as many Pokémon as you possibly can. Some familiar faces pop up in the tall grass and dozens of new Pokémon make their debuts. Try your hand at new attacks and witness surprising evolutions, while filling your Pokédex with the latest discoveries.

BR.name: Pokémon™ Gold Version (Versão espanhol)
BR.description: Quando chegou ao console Game Boy™ Color, o jogo Pokémon Gold Version continuou a expandir o universo Pokémon, adicionando 100 novos Pokémon, itens, ovos e eventos em tempo real devido a um relógio interno no jogo. Agora, uma nova funcionalidade permite trocar e batalhar Pokémon pela comunicação local sem fio em consoles da linha Nintendo 3DS™! Dezenas de Pokémon juntam-se à ação, incluindo o trio de Pokémon lendários, Raikou, Entei e Suicune. Pokémon Gold Version trouxe também novos tipos de Pokémon: encontre Pokémon dos tipos Steel e Dark nas suas aventuras. No começo da sua expedição você terá a opção de escolher um dos três Pokémon iniciais: Chikorita, Cyndaquil ou Totodile. Depois, prepare-se para batalhas frequentes com seu rival enquanto vocês exploram a incrível região Johto. Em Pokémon Gold Version você encontrará Pokémon que não podem ser encontrados em Pokémon Silver Version, então procure um Treinador que tenha o outro jogo para poder trocar!

BE.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
BE.description: Bonus valable jusqu'au 31/12/2017 : Code de téléchargement pour le thème Pokémon : Pokémon Or sur Nintendo 3DS. Le code de téléchargement est valable jusqu'au 31/01/2018. Bonus valable jusqu'au 21/09/2018 : Code de téléchargement pour Celebi, le Pokémon fabuleux. Le code de téléchargement est valable jusqu'au 31/10/2018. Bienvenue dans les aventures palpitantes de Pokémon Version Or et Pokémon Version Argent ! Ces deux jeux arborent un look très coloré et offrent une foule de nouveaux Pokémon en plus des 150 issus de Pokémon Version Rouge et Pokémon Version Blue. Vous débutez comme apprenti Dresseur et vous devrez explorer l'immense île de Johto afin de capturer le plus grand nombre de Pokémon possible. Des visages familiers apparaîtront dans les herbes hautes et des dizaines de nouveaux Pokémon font leur entrée dans cette aventure.

movies.name: Pokémon Or & Argent : bande-annonce de lancement

DE.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
DE.description: Bonus bis zum 31.12.2017: Downloadcode für das Pokémon Goldene Edition Design für den Nintendo 3DS. Der Downloadcode ist bis zum 31.01.2018 gültig. Bonus bis zum 21.09.2018: Downloadcode für das mysteriöse Pokémon Celebi. Der Downloadcode ist bis zum 31.10.2018 gültig. Willkommen bei den aufregenden Abenteuern von Pokémon - Goldene Edition und Pokémon - Silberne Edition! Diese beiden Spiele bieten prächtige Farben sowie eine Menge neuer Pokémon – zusätzlich zu den 150 aus Pokémon Rote Edition und Pokémon Blaue Edition. Du beginnst als unerfahrener Trainer und erforschst die Insel Johto. Dein Ziel ist es, so viele Pokémon wie möglich zu fangen. Auf deinem Weg durchs hohe Gras wirst du einige alte Bekannte treffen – und staunen, wenn Dutzende neue Pokémon ihren ersten Auftritt haben. Probiere neue Angriffe aus und sei Zeuge erstaunlicher Entwicklungen, während du den Pokédex mit deinen neusten Entdeckungen füllst.

movies.name: Pokémon Gold & Silber: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

ES.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
ES.description: Bonificación hasta el 31-12-2017: Código de descarga para el tema Pokémon Edición Oro para Nintendo 3DS. El código de descarga es válido hasta el 31-01-2018. Bonificación hasta el 21-09-2018: Código de descarga para el Pokémon singular Celebi. El código de descarga es válido hasta el 31-10-2018. ¡Bienvenidos a las fascinantes aventuras de Pokémon Edición Oro y Pokémon Edición Plata! Estos dos juegos presentan un aspecto lleno de colorido y contienen un montón de nuevos Pokémon además de los 150 de Pokémon Edición Roja y Pokémon Edición Azul. Empezando como entrenador novato, explorarás la isla de Johto, y te embarcarás en una búsqueda para capturar tantos Pokémon como puedas. Surgirán algunas caras conocidas de entre la vegetación y también debutarán decenas de nuevos Pokémon. Intenta probar ataques nuevos y experimenta una evolución sorprendente, a la vez que llenas tu Pokédex de los últimos descubrimientos.

movies.name: Pokémon Oro & Plata: Tráiler de lanzamiento

CA.name: Pokémon™ Gold Version (Spanish Version)
CA.description: When initially launched on the Game Boy™ Color system, the Pokémon Gold Version game continued to expand the Pokémon universe, adding 100 Pokémon, held items, Pokémon eggs, and real-time events thanks to an internal game clock. Now a new feature lets you trade and battle Pokémon using local wireless on the Nintendo 3DS™ family of systems! Dozens of Pokémon join the action, including Legendary Pokémon trio Raikou, Entei, and Suicune. Pokémon Gold Version introduced new Pokémon types as well—look out for Steel-type and Dark-type Pokémon throughout your travels. At the start of your expedition, you'll have the option to choose one of three starting Pokémon: Chikorita, Cyndaquil, or Totodile. Then, prepare to battle your rival frequently as the two of you make your way across the incredible Johto region. You’ll find Pokémon in Pokémon Gold Version that you won’t find in Pokémon Silver Version, so look for a fellow Trainer to trade with! The Mythical Pokémon Celebi will be available as a gift in Pokémon Sun, Pokémon Moon, Pokémon Ultra Sun, and Pokémon Ultra Moon for players who have purchased the Nintendo 3DS Virtual Console versions of Pokémon Gold or Pokémon Silver. Celebi cannot be obtained through normal gameplay. * The code will appear when Pokémon Gold or Pokémon Silver is purchased in Nintendo eShop between September 22, 2017 and September 21, 2018. Enter the code by October 31, 2018 to claim Celebi in your Pokémon Sun, Pokémon Moon, Pokémon Ultra Sun, or Pokémon Ultra Moon game. Celebi will not be available for your Pokémon Gold or Pokémon Silver game. For more info, visit [Pokemon.com}

NL.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
NL.description: Bonus geldig tot en met 31-12-2017: Downloadcode voor het thema Pokémon: Pokémon Gold Version voor de Nintendo 3DS. De downloadcode is geldig tot en met 31-01-2018. Bonus geldig tot en met 21/09/2018: Downloadcode voor het mythische Pokémon Celebi. De downloadcode is geldig tot en met 31-10-2018. Welkom bij de schitterende avonturen Pokémon Gold en Silver! Deze twee games zijn zeer kleurrijk en bevatten hele hordes nieuwe Pokémon bovenop de 150 uit Pokémon Red en Blue. Je start deze game als beginnende trainer en je verkent het eiland Johto. Jouw doel is om zoveel mogelijk Pokémon te vangen. Er zullen wat bekende snoetjes opduiken uit het lange gras, maar je zult ook versteld staan van de vele nieuwe Pokémon die in dit spel hun debuut maken. Probeer eens wat nieuwe aanvalstechnieken uit en verbaas je over de verrassende evoluties terwijl je jouw Pokédex aanvult met de nieuwste ontdekkingen.

IE.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
IE.description: Bonus until 31/12/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pokémon Gold Version for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/01/2018. Bonus until 21/09/2018 Download code for the Mythical Pokémon Celebi. The download code is valid until 31/10/2018. Welcome to the exciting adventures of Pokémon Gold and Silver! IT.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
IT.description: Bonus valido fino al giorno 31/12/2017: Codice download per il tema Pokémon Versione Oro per Nintendo 3DS. Il codice download è valido fino al giorno 31/01/2018. Bonus valido fino al giorno 21/09/2018: Codice download per il il Pokémon misterioso Celebi. Il codice download è valido fino al giorno 31/10/2018. Benvenuto nelle emozionanti avventure: Pokémon Oro e Argento! Questi due giochi sono ricchi di colori e offrono un mucchio di nuovi Pokémon, che si aggiungono ai 150 di Pokémon Rosso e Blu. Inizierai come un addestratore principiante, esplorerai l'ampia e caotica isola di Johto, e affronterai una missione: catturare il maggior numero possibile di Pokémon. Alcune facce familiari sbucano dall'erba alta, e dozzine di nuovi Pokémon appaiono per la prima volta.

movies.name: Pokémon Oro & Argento: trailer di lancio

SK.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
SK.description: Bonus until 31/12/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pokémon Gold Version for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/01/2018. Bonus until 21/09/2018 Download code for the Mythical Pokémon Celebi. The download code is valid until 31/10/2018. Welcome to the exciting adventures of Pokémon Gold and Silver! These two games sport a colourful look and supply a slew of new Pokémon in addition to the 150 from Pokémon Red, Blue and Yellow. Starting out as a rookie Trainer, you'll explore the sprawling island of Johto, and embark on a quest to capture as many Pokémon as you possibly can. Some familiar faces pop up in the tall grass and dozens of new Pokémon make their debuts. Try your hand at new attacks and witness surprising evolutions, while filling your Pokédex with the latest discoveries.

PT.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
PT.description: Bónus até 31/12/2017: Código de download para o tema Pokémon: Pokémon Gold Version para a Nintendo 3DS. O código de download é válido até 31/01/2018. Bónus até 21/09/2018: Código de download para o Pokémon Mítico Celebi. O código de download é válido até 31/10/2018. Pokémon Gold e Pokémon Silver oferecem emocionantes aventuras! Estes dois coloridos jogos contam com uma quantidade de Pokémon novos, para além dos 150 de Pokémon Red, Pokémon Blue e Pokémon Yellow. Começas como treinador novato e vais explorando a imensa ilha de Johto, para depois embarcares numa missão para capturares o maior número de Pokémon possível, tanto novos como conhecidos. Experimenta os novos ataques e testemunha evoluções surpreendentes, enquanto completas o Pokédex com as descobertas mais recentes. Juntamente com os avanços nos estudos Pokémon vêm inovações tecnológicas. Os cientistas têm estado a trabalhar arduamente no sentido de criarem novas invenções e melhorarem as antigas para te ajudarem a colecionar e a manter os teus Pokémon.

movies.name: Pokémon Gold & Silver: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
RU.description: Бонус действителен до 31.12.2017: Код загрузки для темы Pokémon: версия Pokémon Gold для системы Nintendo 3DS. Код загрузки действителен до 31.01.2018. Бонус действителен до 21.09.2018: Код загрузки для Вас ждет мифический покемон Селеби. Код загрузки действителен до 31.10.2018. Приглашаем вас в увлекательные приключения Pokémon Gold и Silver! В этих двух красочных играх представлено множество новых покемонов, пополняющих ряды 150 покемонов из игр Pokémon Red, Blue и Yellow. Начав свою тренерскую карьеру с самых азов, вы исследуете обширный регион Джото и отправляетесь в приключение, чтобы поймать как можно больше покемонов. В высокой траве вам повстречаются как уже знакомые мордочки, так и дюжины покемонов, которых вы увидите впервые. Пробуйте новые атаки и наблюдайте удивительные эволюции, пополняя свой Покедекс новыми находками.

movies.name: Pokémon Gold & Silver: трейлер к выходу игры

PL.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
PL.description: Bonus until 31/12/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pokémon Gold Version for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/01/2018. MX.name: Pokémon™ Gold Version (Versión español)
MX.description: Cuando se lanzó el juego Pokémon Edición Oro en la consola Game Boy™ Color, se expandió el universo Pokémon con 100 Pokémon nuevos, objetos para retener, huevos Pokémon y eventos en tiempo real gracias a un reloj de juego interno. ¡Ahora podrás intercambiar y enfrentar a los Pokémon con la comunicación local de las consolas Nintendo 3DS™! Docenas de Pokémon se unen a la acción, incluyendo el legendario trio Pokémon: Raikou, Entei y Suicune. Pokémon Edición Oro incorpora nuevos tipos de Pokémon, busca los de tipo acero y tipo siniestro a lo largo de tus viajes. Al inicio de tu expedición tendrás la opción de escoger uno de los tres Pokémon iniciales: Chikorita, Cyndaquil o Totodile. Luego, prepárate para luchar frecuentemente con tu rival mientras los dos buscan llegar a la región de Johto. Encontrarás Pokémon en Pokémon Edición Oro que no encontrarás en Pokémon Edición Plata, ¡así que busca otro entrenador para intercambiar! El Pokémon singular Celebi estará disponible como regalo en Pokémon Sol, Pokémon Luna, Pokémon Ultrasol y Pokémon Ultraluna para los jugadores que hayan adquirido las versiones de Virtual Console para la consola Nintendo 3DS de Pokémon Edición Oro y Pokémon Edición Plata. Celebi no puede obtenerse a través del juego normal. *El código se mostrará cuando Pokémon Edición Oro o Pokémon Edición Plata sean adquiridos en Nintendo eShop entre el 22 de septiembre de 2017 y el 21 de septiembre de 2018. Ingresa el código antes del 31 de octubre de 2018 para obtener a Celebi en tu juego Pokémon Sol, Pokémon Luna, Pokémon Ultrasol y Pokémon Ultraluna. Celebi no estará disponible para los juegos Pokémon Edición Oro o Pokémon Edición Plata. Para más información visita [Pokemon.com}

NO.name: Pokémon™ Edición Oro
NO.description: Bonus until 31/12/2017: Download code for the theme Pokémon: Pokémon Gold Version for Nintendo 3DS. The download code is valid until 31/01/2018. Bonus until 21/09/2018 Download code for the Mythical Pokémon Celebi. The download code is valid until 31/10/2018. Welcome to the exciting adventures of Pokémon Gold and Silver! These two games sport a colourful look and supply a slew of new Pokémon in addition to the 150 from Pokémon Red, Blue and Yellow. Starting out as a rookie Trainer, you'll explore the sprawling island of Johto, and embark on a quest to capture as many Pokémon as you possibly can. Some familiar faces pop up in the tall grass and dozens of new Pokémon make their debuts. Try your hand at new attacks and witness surprising evolutions, while filling your Pokédex with the latest discoveries.

US.name: Pokémon™ Gold Version (Spanish Version)
US.description: When initially launched on the Game Boy™ Color system, the Pokémon Gold Version game continued to expand the Pokémon universe, adding 100 Pokémon, held items, Pokémon eggs, and real-time events thanks to an internal game clock. Now a new feature lets you trade and battle Pokémon using local wireless on the Nintendo 3DS™ family of systems! Dozens of Pokémon join the action, including Legendary Pokémon trio Raikou, Entei, and Suicune. Pokémon Gold Version introduced new Pokémon types as well—look out for Steel-type and Dark-type Pokémon throughout your travels. At the start of your expedition, you'll have the option to choose one of three starting Pokémon: Chikorita, Cyndaquil, or Totodile. Then, prepare to battle your rival frequently as the two of you make your way across the incredible Johto region. You’ll find Pokémon in Pokémon Gold Version that you won’t find in Pokémon Silver Version, so look for a fellow Trainer to trade with! The Mythical Pokémon Celebi will be available as a gift in Pokémon Sun, Pokémon Moon, Pokémon Ultra Sun, and Pokémon Ultra Moon for players who have purchased the Nintendo 3DS Virtual Console versions of Pokémon Gold or Pokémon Silver. Celebi cannot be obtained through normal gameplay. * The code will appear when Pokémon Gold or Pokémon Silver is purchased in Nintendo eShop between September 22, 2017 and September 21, 2018. Enter the code by October 31, 2018 to claim Celebi in your Pokémon Sun, Pokémon Moon, Pokémon Ultra Sun, or Pokémon Ultra Moon game. Celebi will not be available for your Pokémon Gold or Pokémon Silver game. For more info, visit [Pokemon.com}
